Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
Contains an array of accounts and performs the operations the user desires.
Author:
Seifeldeen Mohamed

      Parameters:
      account - account to find
      Returns:
      NOT_FOUND if not found the array, index of the account otherwise

      Parameters:
      account - account to check existence of
      Returns:
      false if not found in array, true if it was found

    • preventedFromBeingAdded

      private boolean preventedFromBeingAdded(Account account)
      Will check if an account already exists to make sure that the user will be able to open one. This method also makes sure that the profile holder also does not have a checking while trying to open a college checking or vice versa
      Parameters:
      account - account to try to find an existing copy of.
      Returns:
      true if account exists, false otherwise

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      A method to add a new Account in the Array.
      Parameters:
      account - account to open
      Returns:
      true if successfully added to the array, false if it was prevented from being added by something that already exists in array

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Remove an account from the Array
      Parameters:
      account - account to remove
      Returns:
      true if successful and false otherwise
